name: Salads

pages.text: $(thing)Salads$() are a meal prepared in a $(thing)Bowl$() from up to five $(thing)Fruits$(), $(thing)Vegetables$(), or $(thing)Cooked Meats$().$(br2)Salads are one of the simplest meals to make, and just require a $(l:mechanics/bowls)Bowl$(). First, hold the $(thing)Bowl$() and press $(item)$(k:key.use)$() while holding $(item)$(k:key.sneak)$(). This will open the salad screen.
Up to five ingredients can be added in the top slots. $(thing)Bowls$() can be added in the left bottom slot. When you are done, the salad can be taken out from the right bottom slot.
